snippet: In this era of instant wireless communication, why isn’t black-box data transmitted in real time via satellite? Such technology exists.
abstract: Editorial, citing disappearance of Malaysia Airlines Flight MH370, questions why black-box data is not transmitted in real time via satellites in an era of instant communication; contends cost of installing technology is preferable to the expense in money and public relations when disasters occur.
lead_paragraph: In this era of instant wireless communication, why isn’t black-box data transmitted in real time via satellite? Such technology exists.
